Title: We Bought a Zoo
Writer: Aline Brosh McKenna (screenplay), Cameron Crowe (screenplay), Benjamin Mee (book)
Actors: Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson, Thomas Haden Church, Colin Ford
Plot: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.
Production: Twentieth Century Fox, Dune, Vinyl Films
